1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Empty
5  ( ropsCoxEmpty,
6    -- * both
7    consBoth, relmapBoth,
8    -- * maybe
9    consMaybe, relmapMaybe, relkitMaybe,
10    -- * compose-maybe
11    consComposeMaybe, relmapComposeMaybe,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data              as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Op
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat          as Op
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Get       as Op
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message  as Msg
21
22
23-- | Relmap operators that handles empties.
24--
25--   [@both R@]
26--
27--   [@maybe R@]
28--     Meet input and given relation.
29--     It keeps input tuples of which counterparts are totally negated.
30-- 
31ropsCoxEmpty :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
32ropsCoxEmpty = Op.ropList "cox-empty"  -- GROUP
33    --        CONSTRUCTOR USAGE                              ATTRIBUTE
34    [ Op.def  consBoth    "both R [-share /P ... -fill E]"   "-relmap/ . -share? -fill?"
35    , Op.def  consComposeMaybe  "compose-maybe R [-share /P ... -fill E]"
36                                                             "-relmap/ . -share? -fill?"
37    , Op.def  consMaybe   "maybe R [-share /P ... -fill E]"  "-relmap/ . -share? -fill?"
38    ]
39
40
41-- ----------------------  both
42
43consBoth :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
44consBoth med =
45    do rmap <- Op.getRelmap med "-relmap"
46       fill <- Op.getFiller med "-fill"
47       sh   <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerms med "-share"
48       Right $ relmapBoth med sh fill rmap
49
50-- | Create @both@ relmap.
51relmapBoth :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Op.SharedTerms -> c -> B.Map (C.Relmap c)
52relmapBoth med sh fill rmap = C.relmapCopy med "i" rmapBoth where
53    rmapBoth = rmapL B.<> Op.relmapJoin med sh rmapR
54    rmapR    = rmap  B.<> relmapMaybe med sh fill rmapIn
55    rmapL    = relmapMaybe med sh fill rmap
56    rmapIn   = C.relmapLocalSymbol med "i"
57
58
59-- ----------------------  maybe
60
61-- | Construct maybe relmap.
62consMaybe :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
63consMaybe med =
64    do rmap <- Op.getRelmap med "-relmap"
65       fill <- Op.getFiller med "-fill"
66       sh   <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerms med "-share"
67       Right $ relmapMaybe med sh fill rmap
68
69-- | Create @maybe@ relmap.
70relmapMaybe :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Op.SharedTerms -> c -> B.Map (C.Relmap c)
71relmapMaybe med sh = C.relmapBinary med . relkitMaybe sh
72
73-- | Create @maybe@ relkit.
74relkitMaybe :: forall c. (Ord c, D.CRel c) => Op.SharedTerms -> c -> C.RelkitBinary c
75relkitMaybe sh fill (C.Relkit _ (Just he2) kitb2) (Just he1) = kit3 where
76    lr   = D.shareSide he1 he2
77    he3  = he2 B.<> he1
78    kit3 = case Op.unmatchShare sh lr of
79             Nothing     -> Right $ C.relkitJust he3 $ C.RelkitAbFull False kitf3 [kitb2]
80             Just (e, a) -> Msg.unmatchShare e a
81
82    kitf3 :: [C.BodyMap c] -> C.BodyMap c
83    kitf3 bmaps bo1 =
84        do let [bmap2] = bmaps
85           bo2 <- bmap2 bo1
86           let b2map = B.gatherToMap $ map (D.ssRSplit lr) bo2
87           Right $ step b2map `concatMap` bo1
88
89    heFill = D.ssRSide lr $ D.headTypes he2
90    fills  = selectFiller fill `map` heFill
91    step b2map cs1 = case B.lookupMap (D.ssLShare lr cs1) b2map of
92                       Just b2side -> map (++ cs1) b2side
93                       Nothing     -> [fills ++ cs1]
94
95relkitMaybe _ _ _ _ = Right C.relkitNothing
96
97selectFiller :: (D.CRel c) => c -> D.Type -> c
98selectFiller _ t@(D.TypeRel _) = D.pRel $ D.Rel (D.Head t) []
99selectFiller fill _ = fill
100
101
102-- ----------------------  compose-maybe
103
104-- | __compose-maybe__
105--
106---  Construct relmap for relational composition.
107--
108--   >>> a | compose-maybe b
109
110consComposeMaybe :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
111consComposeMaybe med =
112    do rmap <- Op.getRelmap med "-relmap"
113       fill <- Op.getFiller med "-fill"
114       sh   <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerms med "-share"
115       Right $ relmapComposeMaybe med sh fill rmap
116
117-- | Create @compose-maybe@ relmap.
118relmapComposeMaybe :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Op.SharedTerms -> c -> B.Map (C.Relmap c)
119relmapComposeMaybe med sh fill = C.relmapBinary med $ Op.relkitCompose m sh where
120    m sh2 = relkitMaybe sh2 fill
121
